product_name: New Balance MR10v2 Minimus Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: New Balance MR10v2 Minimus road-running shoes offer all the benefits of barefoot running with the protection of a lightweight trainer. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike. Durable, lightweight nylon uppers feature polyurethane overlays for lightweight support and engineered flex points for better foot movement. Synthetic linings wick perspiration away from your feet and dry quickly to discourage the development of blisters; antimicrobial treatment discourages odors. Lightweight EVA midsoles offer superb flexibility and featherweight cushion. Minimal Vibram(R) rubber outsoles provide excellent grip on the road. New Balance MR10v2 Minimus men's road-running shoes are designed to be worn with or without socks.
short_description: New Balance MR10v2 Minimus road-running shoes offer all the benefits of barefoot running with the protection of a lightweight trainer.
